original: Lundgren, Eric Aloander, direktör, Vänersborg, f. 30/10/94 i Vårvik, Älvs-b. 1., av fanj. Anton Lundgren o. Fredrika Andersson. G. m. Gertrud El-vinger. Barn: Lars-Eric f. 20, Bernt 28. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 15, stud. v. HHS. Tj :man v. stat. industrikomm. 18, avdxh. h. A-B Skattefri Sprit i Sthlm 19-23, tj:man v. A-B Sthhns-syst. 24-25, disp. f. System A-B i Höör 26-34, i Filipstad 35-36 o. i Vänersb. 37-38, verkst. dir. där sed. 38, led. av Styr. f. Systembol :dir. för. sed. 46, rev. i VARA. Hobbies : schack, sportfiske.
translated: Lundgren, Eric Aloander, director, Vänersborg, b. 30/10/1894 in Vårvik, Älvsborg County, son of Sergeant Anton Lundgren and Fredrika Andersson. Married to Gertrud Elvinger. Children: Lars-Eric, born in 1920, and Bernt, born in 1928. Completed secondary school in Stockholm in 1915, studied at HHS (unknown abbreviation) thereafter. Worked as a clerk for the state industrial committee from 1918, served as an accountant for A-B Skattefri Sprit in Stockholm from 1919 to 1923, clerk for A-B Sthhns-syst. (unknown abbreviation) from 1924 to 1925, and as a manager for System A-B in Höör from 1926 to 1934, in Filipstad from 1935 to 1936, and in Vänersborg from 1937 to 1938. Currently serving as the managing director there since 1938, also a member of the Board of Directors for Systembol since 1946 and a reviewer for VARA (unknown abbreviation). Hobbies include chess and sports fishing.
